resources.file: giornos theme but only the best part is in.mp3
resources.name: giornos theme but only the best part is in.mp3

objects.name: desc
objects.string:
Tim has crash landed in the Solar system, and we have to help him get home. However, he is really bad at flying a keeps crashing. we need to pick up all the parts from each planet to help him get to the sun so he can go back to his own galaxy.

To Play:
left = left arrow
right = right arrow
jump = space

Press space to play

objects.name: notcomplete
objects.string: You need to get more bolts

events.comment: play falling off + all lives gone
cheats. i = invinceablity. c= collects all bolts. k = defaets all enimies

objects.name: deadmessage
objects.string:
You are dead. 

Tim did not make it home.


Press the back button to go back to home screen

objects.name: Back
objects.string: press back to go back to start

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Gruk
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
This behavior moves an object (like an enemy) for a chosen time or distance, then flips it and starts over, moving the object back and forth, vertically or horizontally.

Note: animations should be facing **Left** (for horizontal) or **Down** (for vertical) direction.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: TimedBackAndForthMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: This behavior moves an object (like an enemy) for a chosen time or distance, then flips it and starts over, moving the object back and forth, vertically or horizontally.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Move an object (e.g. enemy) for a chosen time or distance, then flip it and start over. 
Note: animations should be facing LEFT.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: TimedBackAndForthMirroredMovement

propertyDescriptors.label: Move the object vertically (instead of horizontally)
propertyDescriptors.name: Vertical

propertyDescriptors.label: position of the sprite at the previous frame
propertyDescriptors.name: LastPosition

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: StayOnScreen
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: StayOnScreen

parameters: min(max(Object.X(), CameraX(Object.Layer(), 0) - CameraWidth(Object.Layer(), 0)/2 + Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginLeft()), CameraX(Object.Layer(), 0) + CameraWidth(Object.Layer(), 0)/2 - Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginRight())

min(max(Object.Y(), CameraY(Object.Layer(), 0) - CameraHeight(Object.Layer(), 0)/2+ Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginTop()), CameraY(Object.Layer(), 0) + CameraHeight(Object.Layer(), 0)/2- Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginBottom())

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Move the object linearly, according to the speed configured on X and Y axis. Useful for simple enemies, bullets or objects following a straight line on the screen.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: LinearMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Move the object linearly, according to the speed configured on X and Y axis. Useful for simple enemies, bullets or objects following a straight line on the screen.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move the object linearly, according to the speed configured on X and Y axis. Useful for simple enemies, bullets or objects following a straight line on the screen.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: LinearMovement

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: FireBullet
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FireBullet

eventsFunctions.description: Fire a bullet toward a position
eventsFunctions.fullName: Fire a bullet toward a position
eventsFunctions.name: FireTowardPosition

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.name: Fire
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_;_PARAM3_, with angle _PARAM5_ and speed _PARAM6_ px/s

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Angle of the bullet, in degrees
parameters.name: Angle

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
